text: Rare metal or Rare Metals may refer to: * Avalon Rare Metals, a Canadian mineral extraction company * GPS, V1: Rare Metals, an album by trumpeter Dave Douglas * Precious metal, any metal of very high value * Rare-earth element, any naturally occurring metallic element * Rare Metals, Arizona, an unincorporated community in the United States ==See also== * Precious metal (disambiguation)
title: Rare Metals
